item.title: Changes
item.description:
What Is This About?

The IT folks want to shut down our department's Apache server, so I'm in the process of moving my web presence, such as it is, elsewhere, with elsewhere being github, at least for now. I probably won't move much of the old stuff over, since it's, well, old, but if there was something there that you found useful, send me an email and I'll see what I can to to make it available again.

Course Web Pages

Tonight I decided to hide the web pages for courses I'm teaching under the "Teaching" menu up above, so if you've in my probability class, you know what to do.

item.title: Org Mode Tips and Tricks
item.description:
Stacking Tables

The org-mode equivalent of rbind() in R is revealed here by Emmanuel Charpentier.
